name: Sorel Snow Commander Winter Boots - Infants
description: Young explorers can take on mighty adventures when they set out with warm dry feet.Uppers are polyurethane-backed synthetic textile.Stuffed with 200 grams of synthetic insulation.Simple closure system makes them easy to pull on and off.Outsoles are injection-moulded waterproof thermal rubber with traction enhancing multi-directional lugs.
